mapper.insert: INSERT INTO decoration_company_credit_billing (store_id, store_name, start_time, end_time, bill_name, bill_amount, repaid_amount, is_pay_off, operation_id, pay_off_operation_id, credit_billing_no, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{billName}, #{billAmount}, #{repaidAmount}, #{isPayOff}, #{operationId}, #{payOffOperationId}, #{creditBillingNo}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

INSERT INTO decoration_company_credit_billing_details (store_id, credit_billing_no, order_number, creator_id, creator_name, order_time, delivery_address, credit_money, receiver, goods_qty,account_money,estateInfo) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{creditBillingNo}, #{orderNumber}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{orderTime}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{creditMoney}, #{receiver}, #{goodsQty},#{accountMoney},#{estateInfo})

INSERT INTO decoration_company_credit_billing_details (store_id, credit_billing_no, order_number, creator_id, creator_name, order_time, delivery_address, credit_money, receiver, goods_qty,remark,account_money,estateInfo) VALUES
(#{item.storeId}, #{item.creditBillingNo}, #{item.orderNumber}, #{item.creatorId}, #{item.creatorName}, #{item.orderTime}, #{item.deliveryAddress}, #{item.creditMoney}, #{item.receiver}, #{item.goodsQty}, #{item.remark},#{item.accountMoney},#{item.estateInfo})
mapper.select: SELECT id, store_name, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%y/%m/%d'),'~', DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%y/%m/%d')) cycleTime, bill_name, IFNULL(bill_amount, 0) bill_amount, IFNULL(repaid_amount, 0) repaid_amount, is_pay_off, credit_billing_no, create_time, update_time, operation_id FROM decoration_company_credit_billing WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT dccbd.creator_name, dccbd.order_time createTime, dccbd.delivery_address, IFNULL(dccbd.credit_money, 0) credit_money, dccbd.order_number, dccbd.receiver, IFNULL(dccbd.goods_qty, 0) goods_qty, dccbd.remark, s.sales_manager_name, dccbd.account_money, dccbd.estateInfo FROM decoration_company_credit_billing_details dccbd left join st_store s on s.store_id = dccbd.store_id WHERE dccbd.credit_billing_no = #{creditBillingNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE decoration_company_credit_billing SET repaid_amount = #{repaidAmount}, is_pay_off = #{isPayOff}, pay_off_operation_id = #{payOffOperationId}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ol.create_time shippingTime, obi.create_time orderTime, ogi.ord_no orderNumber, ogi.sku sku, ogi.sku_name skuName, IF(og.delivery_type = 'HOUSE_DELIVERY', og.shipping_address, og.booking_store_address) shippingAddress, og.receiver customerName, IFNULL(ogi.order_qty, 0) quantity, IFNULL(ogi.settlement_price, 0) settlementPrice, (IFNULL(ogi.order_qty, 0) * IFNULL(ogi.settlement_price, 0)) settlementTotlePrice, IFNULL(ogi.wholesale_price, 0) jxPrice, (IFNULL(ogi.order_qty, 0) * IFNULL(ogi.wholesale_price, 0)) totalJxPrice FROM ord_goods_info ogi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details ol ON ogi.ord_no = ol.order_no AND ol.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info og ON og.ord_no = ogi.ord_no INNER JOIN decoration_company_credit_billing_details dcd ON dcd.order_number = ogi.ord_no LEFT JOIN ord_base_info obi ON ogi.ord_no =obi.ord_no WHERE dcd.credit_billing_no = #{creditBillingNo} UNION SELECT ord.create_time returnTime, obi.create_time orderTime, orgi.return_no orderNumber, orgi.sku sku, orgi.sku_name skuName, IF(orl.delivery_type = 'HOUSE_PICK', orl.return_full_address, orl.return_store_address) shippingAddress, orl.rejecter customerName, (-1 * IFNULL(orgi.return_qty,0)) quantity, IFNULL(orgi.settlement_price, 0) settlementPrice, (-1 * IFNULL(orgi.return_qty, 0) * IFNULL(orgi.settlement_price, 0)) settlementTotlePrice, IFNULL(orgi.wholesale_price, 0) jxPrice, (IFNULL(orgi.return_qty, 0) * IFNULL(orgi.wholesale_price, 0)) totalJxPrice FROM ord_return_goods_info orgi INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail ord ON orgi.return_no = ord.return_no AND ord.return_logistic_status = 'AGAIN_ON_SALE' INNER JOIN ord_return_logistic_info orl ON orgi.return_no = orl.return_no LEFT JOIN decoration_company_credit_billing_details dcd ON dcd.order_number = orgi.return_no LEFT JOIN ord_return_base_info orbi ON orgi.return_no = orbi.return_no LEFT JOIN ord_base_info obi ON obi.ord_no =orbi.ord_no WHERE dcd.credit_billing_no = #{creditBillingNo}
